column4: sorry, such behavior is not acceptable, no matter how frustrated your Ubuntu problems may have got you. you're muted for 10 minutes
look at what /var/log/Xorg.0.log has to say
the only thing i can see is the fonts are deleted...   how do i get them back?
uhm, in more recent versions, installing xorg or x-window-system would probably do the trick... in hoary, i'm not sure either is there. perhaps x-window-system-core is there
